Rieyi:
We want to explore the relationship between Shilen and present the great disasters. For this purpose, we need to explore the Tower of Insolence, which defied the gods imprisoned Bayoumi. However, our organization operates secretly, so that we can not openly do researches.
For this reason, we are recruiting mercenaries, which can make for us the work. Of course, Krumas guarantee fee, so your hand will not be any loss.
